code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant User
    participant CLI_Typer as Vértice CLI (Retail_CustomerLoyalty)
    participant Cmd_IP as ip.py Command
    participant Auth as auth.py
    participant Connector as IPIntelConnector
    participant Service as IP Intel Service

    User->>+CLI_Typer: vcli ip analyze 8.8.8.8
    CLI_Typer->>+Cmd_IP: analyze(Retail_Inventory)

    Cmd_IP->>+Auth: require_auth(Retail_CustomerLoyalty)
    Auth-->>-Cmd_IP: OK (Retail_CustomerLoyalty)

    Cmd_IP->>+Connector: __init__(Retail_OrderManagement)
    Cmd_IP->>+Connector: health_check(Retail_Inventory)
    Connector->>+Service: GET /health
    Service-->>-Connector: {Retail_PointOfSale}
    Connector-->>-Cmd_IP: True

    Cmd_IP->>+Connector: analyze_ip(Retail_OrderManagement)
    Connector->>+Service: POST /api/ip/analyze
    Note right of Service: Processa o IP, busca em BDs, etc.
    Service-->>-Connector: {Retail_CustomerLoyalty}
    Connector-->>-Cmd_IP: {Retail_CustomerLoyalty}

    Cmd_IP->>CLI_Typer: Formata a saída (Retail_CustomerLoyalty)
    CLI_Typer-->>-User: (Retail_CouponSystem)
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们来设计一下这个流程，首先需要一个开始节点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 确认一下，Vértice CLI (Retail_CustomerLoyalty)、ip.py Command是正确的吧？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: IPIntelConnector、IP Intel Service主要包含以下几类。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 确认一下，IPIntelConnector、IP Intel Service是正确的吧？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们可以将IPIntelConnector、IP Intel Service分为几个类型。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: Formata a saída (Retail_CustomerLoyalty)主要包含以下几类。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达Formata a saída (Retail_CustomerLoyalty)结束。
